Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/31st
ShortDescription: 94 buses temp. rerouted SB California, 31st, Kedzie, 36th and California; NB California, 36th Pl, Albany, 36th, Kedzie, 31 and California: near California/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near California/31st due to street blockage near California/31st.

Southbound buses will operate via 31st, Kedzie, 36th and California including the normal route streets.

Northbound  buses will operate via California, 36th Pl., Albany, 36th, Kedzie, 31st and California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary  Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Mozart
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd: due to street blockage near 63rd/Mozart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd: due to street blockage near 63rd/Mozart.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
